verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> He entered <S%G1525><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> who had <S%G2192><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%> withered. <S%G3583><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They watched <S%G3906><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> whether <S%G1487><s%> he would heal <S%G2323><s%> him <S%G846><s%> on the Sabbath day, <S%G4521><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might accuse <S%G2723><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
<S%G2532><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to the man <S%G1519><s%> who had <S%G2192><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%> withered, <S%G3583><s%> "Stand <S%G1453><s%> up. <S%G444><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> on the Sabbath day <S%G4521><s%> to do good, <S%G15><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> to do harm? <S%G2554><s%> To save <S%G4982><s%> a life, <S%G5590><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> to kill? <S%G615><s%>" But <S%G1161><s%> they were silent. <S%G4623><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> When he had looked around <S%G4017><s%> at them <S%G846><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> anger, <S%G3709><s%> being grieved <S%G4818><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the hardening <S%G4457><s%> of <S%G2588><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to the man, <S%G444><s%> "Stretch out <S%G1614><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%>" He stretched <S%G1614><s%> it out, <S%G1614><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> was restored <S%G600><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> healthy <S%G5199><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the other. <S%G243><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> went out, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> conspired <S%G4824><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the Herodians <S%G2265><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> how <S%G3704><s%> they might destroy <S%G622><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> withdrew <S%G402><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Judea, <S%G2449><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Idumaea, <S%G2401><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> from around <S%G4012><s%> Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sidon. <S%G4605><s%> A great <S%G4183><s%> multitude, <S%G4128><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> what great things <S%G3745><s%> he did, <S%G4160><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He spoke <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G3101><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> a little boat <S%G4142><s%> should stay <S%G4342><s%> near him <S%G846><s%> because of <S%G1223><s%> the crowd, <S%G3793><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that they wouldn't <S%G2346><s%> press on him. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he had healed <S%G2323><s%> many, <S%G4183><s%> so that <S%G5620><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> diseases <S%G3148><s%> pressed on <S%G1968><s%> him <S%G846><s%> that they might <S%G2443><s%> touch <S%G680><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> whenever <S%G3752><s%> they saw <S%G2334><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> fell down before <S%G4363><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cried, <S%G2896><s%> <S%G3004><s%> "You <S%G4771><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God! <S%G3754><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G2008><s%> sternly <S%G4183><s%> warned <S%G2008><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should <S%G5318><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> him <S%G846><s%> known. <S%G5318><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He went up <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the mountain, <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> to himself those whom <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G846><s%> wanted, <S%G2309><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they went <S%G565><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He appointed <S%G4160><s%> twelve, <S%G1427><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might be <S%G5600><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he might send <S%G649><s%> them <S%G846><s%> out <S%G649><s%> to preach, <S%G2784><s%>
and <S%G2532><s%> to have <S%G2192><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> to heal <S%G2323><s%> sicknesses <S%G3554><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to cast out <S%G1544><s%> demons: <S%G1140><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Andrew; <S%G406><s%> Philip; <S%G5376><s%> Bartholomew; <S%G918><s%> Matthew; <S%G3156><s%> Thomas; <S%G2381><s%> James, <S%G2385><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> son of Alphaeus; <S%G256><s%> Thaddaeus; <S%G2280><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> the Zealot; <S%G2581><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> betrayed <S%G3860><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> He came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a house. <S%G3624><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> came together <S%G4905><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> so that <S%G5620><s%> they <S%G846><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> so much as <S%G3383><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

When <S%G191><s%> his <S%G846><s%> friends <S%G3844><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, <S%G1831><s%> they went out to seize <S%G2902><s%> him: <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they said, <S%G3004><s%> "He is insane. <S%G3754><s%>"

The <S%G2532><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> came down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "He has <S%G2192><s%> Beelzebul, <S%G954><s%>" and, <S%G2532><s%> "By <S%G1722><s%> the prince <S%G758><s%> of the demons <S%G1140><s%> he casts out <S%G1544><s%> the demons. <S%G3754><s%>"

He summoned <S%G4341><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> parables, <S%G3850><s%> "How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> cast out <S%G1544><s%> Satan? <S%G4567><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> a house <S%G3614><s%> is divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> itself, <S%G1438><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> stand. <S%G2476><s%>

But no <S%G3756><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> of the strong man <S%G2478><s%> to plunder, <S%G1283><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G4632><s%> unless <S%G3361><s%> he <S%G1210><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> binds <S%G1210><s%> the strong man; <S%G2478><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> he will plunder <S%G1283><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house. <S%G3614><s%>

Most certainly <S%G281><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> sins <S%G265><s%> of the descendants <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> will be forgiven, <S%G863><s%> including <S%G2532><s%> their blasphemies <S%G988><s%> with which <S%G3745><s%> they may <S%G302><s%> blaspheme <S%G987><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> whoever <S%G3739><s%> may <S%G302><s%> blaspheme <S%G987><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> never <S%G1519><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> forgiveness, <S%G859><s%> but <S%G235><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> guilty <S%G1777><s%> of an eternal <S%G166><s%> sin <S%G2920><s%>"
<S%G3754><s%> â€” because they said, <S%G3004><s%> "He has <S%G2192><s%> an unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit. <S%G4151><s%>"

<S%G3767><s%> His <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> without, <S%G1854><s%> they sent <S%G649><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> calling <S%G5455><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

A multitude <S%G3793><s%> was sitting <S%G2521><s%> around <S%G4012><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> they told <S%G2036><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> sisters are without <S%G1854><s%> looking for you. <S%G4571><s%>"
He answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2228><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brothers? <S%G80><s%>"
